subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution:
BRAZIL
( Blackwelder 1944 ): Pará : Taperinha, 22-V-1893 , 1 female ( Schulz 1901 );
Minas Gerais
: “Desertio Prov. Minarum” ( Perty 1830 ); “ Brésil intérieur” ( Lucas 1857 );
Rio de Janeiro
: Petrópolis ( Ohaus 1900 ).
ARGENTINA
( Blackwelder 1944 ):
Jujuy
( Bruch 1911a ); Misiones : Cataratas del Iguazú, 1 ex. ( Richter 1913 ); Alto Paraná ( Bruch 1911a ).
